title: You Asked for It (CRS116)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Josie Spadoni first shared on the podcast in April of 2014 about a very strange request made of a professional dominatrix.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Josie Spadoni, Kevin Allison)
